name: Shine On - Megabyte
description: Megabyte is a virtual pet created by language specialists to combine learning and fun. Your child will learn English while playing, through fun and challenging activities and minigames.   FEATURES + Feed, care and play with Megabyte while practicing your English skills + Designed by teachers and language learning specialists + Made for preschoolers and young children (2 to 6 years old) + Content from Oxford University Press  Global leader in English teaching + Unique voice recognition technology to help children improve their pronunciation + More than 120 words to learn + Dozens of activities and minigames with fun animations + Keep up with childrens development through regular reports + Safe, ad-free environment + Buy once and access on smartphone and tablet   BENEFITS FOR YOUR CHILD + Practice their English frequently + Playful learning with fun and challenging activities and minigames + Improve pronunciation with the help of voice recognition + Feel safe and at ease while speaking English
